message: Any advice on how to cook dry beans in a crockpot?  I love sweet potato puree any recipes for that ...
Hi Herbies, I have been trying to eat plant base for a little bit now.

I am totally a newbie to cooking (have always "fixed" meals... but just learning to cook!)... But, I have a black bean soup for the crockpot I love... I soak my beans overnight, then put them on low all day with the rest of the stuff for soup.... about 8-10 hours usually. (I think the recipe I started with said 2 hr on high then 4 on low...) Works out great.
